column11:
["my specialty is on the Mediterranean island of Crete (--as an island culture/island songs). My native language is Greek; I grew up on the island of Crete (--distinct dialect which varies from west/east, mountains/plains) prior to studying further in Athens and then Indiana University at Bloomington/USA.

Crete has a unique geographical location taken it's at the crossroads of three continents, namely Europe, Asia and Africa, in-between the so-called East & West. In addition, due to its historical background, what we see on its culture has been the result of "syncretic amalgamation" of various elements, namely Minoan, Greek, Byzantine, Arabic, Ottoman, Venetian, to "label" a few. "]
